articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Ready to Reject Efforts to Kick Trump Off the Ballot
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from both ideological wings expressed deep skepticism about Colorado's decision to disqualify Trump under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: Microsoft's AI model Sora creates eerily realistic videos from text
articles.description: OpenAI's parent company Microsoft unveiled Sora, a new AI model capable of creating highly realistic videos from text prompts, marking a significant advancement in AI-generated video technology.

articles.title: King Charles diagnosed with cancer, begins treatment
articles.description: Buckingham Palace announced that King Charles III has been diagnosed with cancer and has begun treatment, though the specific type wasn't disclosed. He will postpone public duties but continue state business.
